member.name: T:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor
member.summary: Cryptographic service for generating hashes or comparing intergrities.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.CalculateHash(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the hash from given buffer array.
member.param: Data buffer array.
Whether to group the hash string by bytes with dashes.
member.returns: Calculated hash string.
member.exception: Throws when buffer is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.CalculateHash(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the hash from given data stream.
member.param: Data stream.
Whether to group the hash string by bytes with dashes.
member.returns: Calculated hash string.
member.exception: Throws when dataStream is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.CalculateHash``1(HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the hash from given CryptoData object.
member.param: Crypto data object.
Whether to group the hash string by bytes with dashes.
member.returns: Calculated hash stored in CryptoData object.
member.exception: Throws when CryptoData is not set.
Throws when Content of CryptoData is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.CalculateHash``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData{``0}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the hashes for each item in given collection of CryptoData objects.
member.param: Collection of CryptoData objects. T is byte[] or Stream.
Whether to group the hash string by bytes with dashes.
member.returns: Update and return the collection of CryptoData with calculated hashes.
member.exception: Throws when CryptoData collection is not set.
Throws when Content of any CryptoData item in the collection is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.CalculateHash``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData{``0}},System.IProgress{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the hashes for each item in given collection of CryptoData objects and reports the progress.
member.param: Collection of CryptoData objects. T is byte[] or Stream.
Progress report to listen on status of completion.
Whether to group the hash string by bytes with dashes.
member.returns: Update and return the collection of CryptoData with calculated hashes.
member.exception: Throws when CryptoData collection is not set.
Throws when Content of any CryptoData item in the collection is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.Compare(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Compare the stream data integrity against the given checksum.
member.param: Checksum string without group seperators.
Data stream.
member.returns: Return true if the stream data matches with given checksum.
member.exception: Throws when hash or datatStream is not set.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.ICryptoProcessor.Compare(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compare the buffer integrity against the given checksum.
member.param: Checksum string without group seperators.
Data buffer array.
member.returns: Return true if the stream data matches with given checksum.
member.exception: Throws when hash or buffer is not set.

member.name: T:HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData`1
member.summary: Crypto Data object with identifer and stream or buffer content.

member.name: P:HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData`1.DataKey
member.summary: Unique key value for data stream or buffer identifier.

member.name: P:HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData`1.Hash
member.summary: Hash value calculated for the Crypto Data content.

member.name: P:HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData`1.Content
member.summary: Data content to calculate hash signature. T is byte[] or Stream.

member.name: M:HashGeneratorLibrary.Models.CryptoData`1.#ctor(System.String,`0)
member.summary: Initialize Crypto Data object with content type T.
member.param: Data key identifier.
Data content. T is byte[] or Stream.
member.exception: Throws when dataKey and content is not set.
Throws when type T is not byte[] or Stream.
